Hi my name is Elijah

I am a Biomedical Engineering Student, Learning Coach, and Indie Game Developer. My interdisciplinary skillset has allowed me to work as Instructional Designer for half a decade, were I have taught over a thousand students, led live workshops infront of 40+ people.

Skills: Copywriting; Marketing; Organizational skills; Teaching; Public Speaking; Project Management; Public Outreach; Microsoft Office.
